<Link id="gga80b57e9f148541803b3ed1169528187ea907a8ef93233960f2907f075f39f46a5" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LLVMAnyComdatSelectionKind">
The linker may choose any COMDAT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="gga80b57e9f148541803b3ed1169528187ea7e01f8f80d4b35b6495a603c8fd945c9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LLVMExactMatchComdatSelectionKind">
The data referenced by the COMDAT must be the same
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="gga80b57e9f148541803b3ed1169528187ea147027adebf8f8011d33067dad285752" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LLVMLargestComdatSelectionKind">
The linker will choose the largest COMDAT
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="gga80b57e9f148541803b3ed1169528187eac4adb55c2b9f3cb601b7603d86498066" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LLVMNoDeduplicateComdatSelectionKind">
No deduplication is performed
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="gga80b57e9f148541803b3ed1169528187ea6d981d6944206f7c5d34671b4a061fa2" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LLVMSameSizeComdatSelectionKind">
The data referenced by the COMDAT must be the same size
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

### LLVMGetOrInsertComdat() {#ga2c1696880a604332d967f41fa93b524a}

<MemberDefinition
